tit.cmt: Chichitusuku Ymatohime→Chichitsuku Yamatohimeに訂正しました。

sen.j: 千千衝倭姫命（ちちつくやまとひめのみこと、生没年未詳）は、崇神天皇の皇女。
sen.e: Princess Chichitusuku Ymatohime [(千千衝倭姫命) Chichitusuku Ymatohime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown] was a princess of the Emperor Suinin (崇神天皇).
Princess Chichitsuku Yamatohime (Chichitsuku Ymatohime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Suinin.
sen.cmt: Chichitusuku Ymatohime→Chichitsuku Yamatohimeに訂正しました。
sen.e: Princess Chichitsuku Yamatohime (Chichitsuku Ymatohime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Suinin.
The mother of Princess Chichitusuku Ymatohime was the Empress Mimakihime (御間城姫).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The mother of Princess Chichitsuku Yzmatohime was the Empress Mimakihime.
sen.cmt: Chichitusuku Ymatohime→Chichitsuku Yamatohimeに訂正しました。
sen.e: The mother of Princess Chichitsuku Yzmatohime was the Empress Mimakihime.

sen.j: 同母兄に垂仁天皇らがいる。
sen.e: The Emperor Suinin (垂仁天皇) was her (Princess Chichitusuku Ymatohime) maternal brother (son of the Emperor Sujin).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The Emperor Suinin was a maternal half-brother of Princess Chichitsuku Ymatohime
The Emperor Suinin was a maternal half-brother of Princess Chichitsuku Ymatohime

sen.j: 異母兄弟に豊城入彦命、八坂入彦命らがいる。
sen.e: The paternal half brothers of Princess Chichitusuku Ymatohime were Prince Toyokiiribiko (豊城入彦命) and Prince Yasakairibiko (八坂入彦命).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The paternal half brothers of Princess Chichitsuku Yamatohime were Prince Toyokiiribiko and Prince Yasakairibiko.
sen.cmt: Chichitusuku Ymatohime→Chichitsuku Yamatohimeに訂正しました。
sen.e: The paternal half brothers of Princess Chichitsuku Yamatohime were Prince Toyokiiribiko and Prince Yasakairibiko.

sen.j: 実績については、詳しくわかっていない。
sen.e: The details of her (Princess Chichitusuku Ymatohime) achievements are unknown.
The details of her (Princess Chichitsuku Yamatohime) achievements are unknown.
sen.cmt: Chichitusuku Ymatohime→Chichitsuku Yamatohimeに訂正しました。
sen.e: The details of her (Princess Chichitsuku Yamatohime) achievements are unknown.
